Content.Title: Different Types

Images.Alt: Image of the gemstones in the game

Text: There are 7 different gemstones added by this mod. Each gemstone corsponds with each gem added by this mod. (See image above for which goes with which one).

Content.Title: Generation
Text: Gemstones are spawned in small clusters with every side except one looking just like stone! This works even if you have a texture pack changing the look of stone! The gemstones spawn in layers so, for example, rubies will never be on the same level as sapphire.

Content.Title: Shards
Text: If you break gemstones with anything other than shards then instead of a gem it will drop a gem shard! Currently, these are useless items (may have a purpose in a later update), so try to be careful when minning or you'll end up with only useless shards!
